snippet.title: Othercide | Announcement Teaser | PC
snippet.description:
Watch the first teaser of Othercide, the new #strategy game currently in development by Lightbulb Crew for PC. 
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/798490/Othercide/

Get a glimpse into a parallel world of darkness and suffering. As a player, you will lead an female warriors, sacrificing themselves in a desperate struggle to push back nightmarish creatures and prevent reality from shattering.

For more information, subscribe to the Othercide official newsletter at: http://www.othercidegame.com/

More at:
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/othercide/
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/OthercideGame
